Now

about me

I'm Jackie, a trans dyke in her early 20s just trying to get back on her feet (does that apply if you were never on them in the first place?) and work towards a future for her and her girlfriend.

what I'm working on

  • rediscovering what makes art fufilling
  • developing a more robust sense of self
  • starting a career
  • padding out my wardrobe
  • using social media less
  • voice training
